vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σταυρ-όω,
(σταυρός) fence with pales, [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—passive, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II crucify, [NT+2nd c.BC+] crucify it, destroy its power, [NT] nail from a cross, as amulet, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: to fix stakes;, later, to crucify, affix to the cross, Mt. 20:19; 23:34; metaphorically to crucify, to mortify, to deaden, to make a sacrifice of, Gal. 5:24; passive to be cut off from a thing, as by a violent death, to be come dead to, Gal. 6:14
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 釘十字架
2) 釘十字架(藉著耶穌被釘而毀滅)
2a)屬基督的將罪的慾望釘在十架上 (加 5:24)
2b)信徒與主聯合,屬世的生命已經死在十架上 (加 6:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 钉十字架
2) 钉十字架(借着耶稣被钉而毁灭)
2a)属基督的将罪的欲望钉在十架上 (加 5:24)
2b)信徒与主联合,属世的生命已经死在十架上 (加 6:14)
